extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected System and Version
extracted_playbook.description: Check if the system is affected by retrieving the installed version of Cisco Unity Connection.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the system affected by the vulnerability?

extracted_playbook.title: Update to Latest Version of Cisco Unity Connection
extracted_playbook.description: Update to the latest version of Cisco Unity Connection to mitigate the vulnerability.

affected_products: Cisco Unity Connection 12.5 and earlier, before 12.5.1.19017-4
